game.title: Ancient Mysteries
game.objective: Uncover the secrets of an ancient artifact.
game.description: The Book of Ancients is rumoured to hold great power and knowledge. It is hidden somewhere in the ancient ruins of Alaranth. Find the book and bring it back to the Order of the Arcane.
game.quest-giver: Master Braemore of the Order of the Arcane

task.objective: The discovery of Alaranth's ancient ruins.
task.description: Travel to the northern mountains and search for clues that reveal the location of the Book of Ancients.

task.objective: The retrieval of ancient texts or artifacts from the ruins.
task.description: Search for any ancient texts or artifacts that may mention the book's whereabouts in the ruins.

task.objective: The defeating of powerful guardians guarding the Book of Ancients.
task.description: The book is guarded by fierce creatures. Prepare for a battle and defeat them using your knowledge of combat or the use of magical artifacts.
task.location: Vault in Ancient Ruins of Alaranth

task.objective: The retrieval of the Book of Ancients from the ruins.
task.description: Find the book and bring it back to Master Braemore using your skills and wits.
task.location: Vault in Ancient Ruins of Alaranth
